release.notes:
This version pressed by Capitol Records Pressing Plant, Los Angeles as indicated in the runout information.

Recorded at Blackwing Studios, London.
Marketed by Warner Bros. Records Inc., a Warner Communications Company. Made in U.S.A.
©1981 Sire Records Company. ©&℗1981 Mute Records, U.K.  

A1 to B1, B4, B5, Published by Stainless Music. 
B2, B3, Published by Emile Music.

Track A1 is New Life (Remix)
Track B5 is Just Can't Get Enough (Schizo Mix)
